notes: OCI pricing is consistent across all commercial regions. Government and sovereign regions may vary.

compute.description: AMD EPYC 7J13 (Milan) - Flexible VM with configurable OCPUs and memory
compute.notes: Memory can be 1-64 GB per OCPU. Previous generation, still widely used.

compute.description: AMD EPYC 9J14 (Genoa) - Latest gen flexible VM, 21%+ better price-performance vs E4
compute.notes: Memory can be 1-64 GB per OCPU. Recommended for new deployments.

compute.description: Ampere Altra (Arm) - Cost-effective Arm-based flexible VM
compute.notes: Arm-based. Best value for compatible workloads. Free tier includes 4 OCPUs + 24GB.

compute.description: Intel Xeon (Ice Lake) - Flexible VM with Intel processors
compute.notes: Intel-based option. Memory can be 1-64 GB per OCPU.

compute.description: Intel Xeon (Ice Lake) - High-frequency optimized for single-threaded workloads
compute.notes: Higher clock speed, optimized for latency-sensitive workloads.

compute.description: AMD EPYC with NVMe - For workloads requiring high local storage IOPS
compute.notes: Includes local NVMe storage. 6.4 TB at 8 OCPU, scales with shape.

compute.description: AMD EPYC 7J13 Bare Metal - 128 OCPUs, 2048 GB RAM
compute.notes: Fixed-shape bare metal. Memory included in instance price.

compute.description: AMD EPYC 9J14 Bare Metal - 192 OCPUs, 2304 GB RAM
compute.notes: Latest generation bare metal. Memory included in instance price.

compute.description: Ampere Altra Bare Metal - 160 OCPUs, 1024 GB RAM
compute.notes: Arm bare metal. Best value for Arm-compatible workloads.

compute.description: NVIDIA A10 GPU Bare Metal - 4 GPUs, 64 OCPUs, 1024 GB RAM
compute.notes: 4x NVIDIA A10 Tensor Core GPUs. Good for inference workloads.

compute.description: NVIDIA H100 GPU Bare Metal - 8 GPUs, 112 OCPUs, 2048 GB RAM
compute.notes: 8x NVIDIA H100 80GB HBM3 GPUs. Premium AI/ML training workloads.

compute.description: NVIDIA A100 GPU Bare Metal - 8 GPUs, 128 OCPUs, 2048 GB RAM
compute.notes: 8x NVIDIA A100 80GB GPUs. High-performance AI/ML workloads.

storage.description: Block Volume - Lower Cost storage tier
storage.notes: 2 VPUs/GB. Up to 3K IOPS, 24 MB/s throughput per volume.
10 VPUs/GB included. Up to 25K IOPS, 480 MB/s throughput.

storage.description: Block Volume Performance Units (VPU) - Additional performance
storage.notes: Per VPU per GB/month. 10 VPUs = Balanced, 20 VPUs = Higher Performance.
20 VPUs/GB. Up to 35K IOPS, 480 MB/s throughput. Includes VPU cost.

storage.description: Block Volume - Ultra High Performance tier
storage.notes: 30-120 VPUs/GB. Up to 225K IOPS, 2.68 GB/s throughput.

storage.description: Object Storage - Standard tier for frequent access
storage.notes: First 10 GB free. Includes 50K free requests/month.
For data accessed less than once per month. 31-day minimum storage.

storage.description: Object Storage - Archive tier for long-term retention
storage.notes: 90-day minimum storage. ~1 hour restore time. Best for compliance data.
Elastic capacity. Supports NFSv3. Multi-AD replication available.

storage.description: Boot Volume - OS disk for compute instances
storage.notes: Same pricing as block volume. Default 47 GB for most images.

database.description: Autonomous Transaction Processing - Serverless OLTP database
database.notes: Auto-scaling, auto-tuning OLTP. Min 2 ECPUs. Storage at $0.0255/GB/month.

database.description: Autonomous Transaction Processing - BYOL (Bring Your Own License)
database.notes: 76% savings with existing Oracle licenses. Min 2 ECPUs.

database.description: Autonomous Data Warehouse - Serverless analytics database
database.notes: Auto-scaling analytics. Optimized for data warehouse workloads.
JSON document store with SQL and SODA APIs.

database.description: MySQL HeatWave - MySQL with in-memory analytics acceleration
database.notes: MySQL 8.0 compatible. HeatWave for real-time analytics.
Block storage for MySQL data. 50 GB minimum.

database.description: OCI Database with PostgreSQL - Managed PostgreSQL service

database.notes: Pay per read/write unit. First 200M reads free, 50M writes free.

database.description: Base Database Service - VM Standard shapes
database.notes: Oracle Database on VM. Enterprise Edition included.

database.description: Base Database Service - VM with BYOL
database.notes: Infrastructure only. Bring your Oracle Database license.

database.description: Exadata Cloud Service - High-performance Oracle Database
database.notes: Quarter rack minimum. Best for mission-critical OLTP/analytics.

networking.description: Flexible Load Balancer - Layer 7 (HTTP/HTTPS) load balancing
networking.notes: Plus $0.0001 per Mbps per hour. First LB and 10 Mbps free for paid accounts.
Per Mbps per hour. Billed at configured minimum or actual usage.

networking.description: Network Load Balancer - Layer 4 (TCP/UDP) load balancing
networking.notes: FREE - No charge for NLB instances or data processing.
FREE - VCN, subnets, route tables, security lists all free.
Private, dedicated connection. Port fee only; partner fees separate.
High-bandwidth private connection. Port fee only.
Highest bandwidth. For large-scale data transfer requirements.
First 10 TB/month FREE. Then $0.0085/GB. Lowest in industry.
Per VPN connection hour. Up to 250 Mbps throughput.

networking.description: NAT Gateway - Outbound internet for private subnets
Service Gateway - Private access to OCI services
networking.notes: FREE - Private path to OCI services without internet.

kubernetes.notes: FREE - Kubernetes control plane management is free.

kubernetes.description: OKE Basic Cluster - Standard managed Kubernetes
kubernetes.notes: Pay only for worker node compute. Control plane free.

kubernetes.description: OKE Enhanced Cluster - Advanced features and SLA
kubernetes.notes: Includes 99.95% SLA, virtual nodes, workload identity. Per cluster hour.

kubernetes.description: OKE Virtual Nodes - Serverless Kubernetes pods
kubernetes.notes: Container-native compute. Pay per pod OCPU and memory.
Per GB of pod memory per hour.

serverless.notes: First 2 million invocations/month free. $0.20 per million after.
First 400K GB-seconds/month free. Memory Ã— execution time.

serverless.description: API Gateway - Per API call charge

serverless.notes: First 1M events/month free. Routes events to Functions, Streaming, Notifications.
First 1M requests/month free. Fully managed message queuing.
Kafka-compatible streaming. Per GB of data stored.
Per GB of data transferred (PUT or GET).
Per partition-hour. Each partition supports 1 MB/s write, 2 MB/s read.

containers.notes: Same as VM.Standard.A1.Flex pricing. First 3000 OCPU-hours/month free.
Same as VM.Standard.A1.Flex pricing. First 18000 GB-hours/month free.
First 5 GB free. Same as Object Storage pricing. 500 repos max.

observability.notes: First 10 GB/month free. Centralized log management.
Per 300 GB unit. Tiered pricing: $0.65/unit at 35+ units.
Per 300 GB unit. Long-term log retention.
First 500M datapoints/month free. Standard metrics always free.
First 1M messages/month free. Email, SMS, Slack, PagerDuty.
First 1000 trace events/hour free. Distributed tracing.
First 10 runs/hour free. Uptime and availability checks.
FREE - Up to 10 health checks per tenancy.

security.notes: FREE - Secure SSH/RDP access without public IPs. Max 3hr sessions.
Dedicated HSM partition. Includes 1000 key versions.
Per active key version. Software-protected keys are free.
First 10M requests/month free. Bot management additional.
FREE - Threat detection and security monitoring.

security.description: Vulnerability Scanning - Host and container scans
security.notes: FREE - Scan compute instances and container images.

Managed data pipelines. Workspace is free, pay for execution.
FREE - Catalog and discover data assets.
Same as compute pricing. JupyterLab environment.
Same as compute pricing. Distributed ML training.
Same as compute pricing. Managed inference endpoints.

dataAnalytics.notes: Compute pricing only. Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, Flink included.
Per OCPU-hour. Heterogeneous data replication and streaming.

aiMl.notes: Per 1K input tokens. Output tokens priced higher.
